fields.name: Sequel:
fields.value: Choose a Player. They are now in the Town 2 faction. This cannot be blocked and is Astral. Their name is is now [Old Name] 2

fields.name: Power in Numbers:
fields.value: Attack a player. For every player converted to Town 2, you are allowed to attack another player.

fields.name: Reboot (Passive):
fields.value: You can never change or convert into another role.
